summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2744 for the improvement of First Avenue South, from King Street to Atlantic Street, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of concrete walks and adjusting and resetting the existing granite curbs, under Ordinance No. 32702 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
